name: drupal/markdown
description: Allows content to be submitted using Markdown, a simple plain-text syntax that is transformed into valid HTML.

suggest.league/commonmark: The PHP CommonMark parser is a robust, highly-extensible Markdown parser for PHP based on the CommonMark and Github-Flavored Markdown specifications (version 1.3.0 and higher is supported).
suggest.webuni/commonmark-attributes-extension: The Attributes extension adds a syntax to define attributes on the various HTML elements in markdown's output.
